etymology: From petate +‎ -ear, because such mat or carpet was used by poor people to wrap a corpse. The reflexive form is an influence of morirse.
definitions: (colloquial, Chile, El Savador, Mexico, Panama, takes a reflexive pronoun) to die
description: petatearse (first-person singular present me petateo, first-person singular preterite me petateé, past participle petateado)
